00006 SassImportList CustomImporterBridge::post_process_return_value(v8::Local<v8::Value> returned_value) const {
00007   SassImportList imports = 0;
00008   Nan::HandleScope scope;
00009 
00010   if (returned_value->IsArray()) {
00011     v8::Local<v8::Array> array = returned_value.As<v8::Array>();
00012 
00013     imports = sass_make_import_list(array->Length());
00014 
00015     for (size_t i = 0; i < array->Length(); ++i) {
00016       v8::Local<v8::Value> value = Nan::Get(array, static_cast<uint32_t>(i)).ToLocalChecked();
00017 
00018       if (!value->IsObject()) {
00019         auto entry = sass_make_import_entry(0, 0, 0);
00020         sass_import_set_error(entry, "returned array must only contain object literals", -1, -1);
00021         continue;
00022       }
00023 
00024       v8::Local<v8::Object> object = value.As<v8::Object>();
00025 
00026       if (value->IsNativeError()) {
00027         char* message = create_string(Nan::Get(object, Nan::New<v8::String>("message").ToLocalChecked()));
00028 
00029         imports[i] = sass_make_import_entry(0, 0, 0);
00030 
00031         sass_import_set_error(imports[i], message, -1, -1);
00032       }
00033       else {
00034         imports[i] = get_importer_entry(object);
00035       }
00036     }
00037   }
00038   else if (returned_value->IsNativeError()) {
00039     imports = sass_make_import_list(1);
00040     v8::Local<v8::Object> object = returned_value.As<v8::Object>();
00041     char* message = create_string(Nan::Get(object, Nan::New<v8::String>("message").ToLocalChecked()));
00042 
00043     imports[0] = sass_make_import_entry(0, 0, 0);
00044 
00045     sass_import_set_error(imports[0], message, -1, -1);
00046   }
00047   else if (returned_value->IsObject()) {
00048     imports = sass_make_import_list(1);
00049     imports[0] = get_importer_entry(returned_value.As<v8::Object>());
00050   }
00051 
00052   return imports;
00053 }

00055 Sass_Import* CustomImporterBridge::check_returned_string(Nan::MaybeLocal<v8::Value> value, const char *msg) const
00056 {
00057     v8::Local<v8::Value> checked;
00058     if (value.ToLocal(&checked)) { 
00059       if (!checked->IsUndefined() && !checked->IsString()) {
00060         goto err;
00061       } else {
00062         return nullptr;
00063       } 
00064     }
00065 err:
00066     auto entry = sass_make_import_entry(0, 0, 0);
00067     sass_import_set_error(entry, msg, -1, -1);
00068     return entry;
00069 }
00070 
00071 Sass_Import* CustomImporterBridge::get_importer_entry(const v8::Local<v8::Object>& object) const {
00072   auto returned_file = Nan::Get(object, Nan::New<v8::String>("file").ToLocalChecked());
00073   auto returned_contents = Nan::Get(object, Nan::New<v8::String>("contents").ToLocalChecked()).ToLocalChecked();
00074   auto returned_map = Nan::Get(object, Nan::New<v8::String>("map").ToLocalChecked());
00075   Sass_Import *err;
00076 
00077   if ((err = check_returned_string(returned_file, "returned value of `file` must be a string")))
00078     return err;
00079 
00080   if ((err = check_returned_string(returned_contents, "returned value of `contents` must be a string")))
00081     return err;
00082 
00083   if ((err = check_returned_string(returned_map, "returned value of `returned_map` must be a string")))
00084     return err;
00085 
00086   char* path = create_string(returned_file);
00087   char* contents = create_string(returned_contents);
00088   char* srcmap = create_string(returned_map);
00089 
00090   return sass_make_import_entry(path, contents, srcmap);
00091 }

00093 std::vector<v8::Local<v8::Value>> CustomImporterBridge::pre_process_args(std::vector<void*> in) const {
00094   std::vector<v8::Local<v8::Value>> out;
00095 
00096   for (void* ptr : in) {
00097     out.push_back(Nan::New<v8::String>((char const*)ptr).ToLocalChecked());
00098   }
00099 
00100   return out;
00101 }
